name: CartLog
descripton: A transport management system for booking and keeping records of a company's road travel information.

name: EveryRead
descripton: Using spaced repetition to help you remember your notes effortlessly. Say goodbye to forgetfulness and hello to effective learning.

name: Honeycomb
descripton: Pool for users to stake an ERC-20 token and receive a share of the total reward pool after certain epochs

name: Mograph Reel
descripton: A visual journey that combines creativity and technical prowess. From stunning animations to eye-catching designs, explore a world of motion in every frame.

name: Day in my Life
descripton: Documenting a day in my life as a codeographer! From sunrise to sunset, witness the hunger, the process, and the twist and turns in my routine.

name: thecodeographer
descripton: Minimalist portfolio website providing a window into my personality, creativity and skillsets.

name: Walkman
descripton: Final class project for Introduction to Programming (I) course at University of London.
